CardFactory - Class in dragonix.fierydragons1.cards
The CardFactory class is responsible for creating and managing DragonCards.
CardFactory() - Constructor for class dragonix.fierydragons1.cards.CardFactory
Constructs a CardFactory, initializing the card counters for each creature type and preparing the list of all possible cards.
Cave - Class in dragonix.fierydragons1.cards
The Cave class represents a cave in the game, with properties such as its position, the creature occupying it, and the player occupying it.
Cave(Circle, Integer, CreatureName) - Constructor for class dragonix.fierydragons1.cards.Cave
Constructs a Cave with the specified arc, position, and creature.
changeToMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class dragonix.fierydragons1.MainAppController

checkVictory(Player) - Method in class dragonix.fierydragons1.handlers.VictoryHandler
Checks if the specified player has achieved victory.

The CircleTypeAdapter class is a Gson TypeAdapter for serializing and deserializing Circle objects.
